term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - sample injector in chromatography
term.title: sample injector

item.text: A device by which a liquid or gaseous sample is introduced into the apparatus. The sample can be introduced directly into the carrier-gas stream, or into a chamber temporarily isolated from the system by values which can be changed so as to make an instantaneous switch of the gas stream through the chamber. The latter is a by-pass injector.
